My Portfolio

Check out some of my projects, and click the titles to read more about them!

Spring 2019: This responsive website was developed using HTML, Node-JS, and SASS. I built this Portfolio Website using HTML, Node-JS, and SASS in a VS Code environment.

Github

January 2019: ARMageddon is a robotic arm controlled using joysticks and biometric signalling.
As the tean's software lead, I wrote the Arduino code to control motor movement, and restrict the number of servos operating to prevent current overdraw.
ARMageddon placed 2nd overall in the "Best Hardware Project" competition.
See more here

Github

December 2018: Number Mash was my ECE 312 Final Project.
Using an ATMEGA328, LCD Display, and a whole lotta wiring, I built a dexterity and skil based video game. Code was written using C in an Atmel Studio environment, and schematics were built with KiCad

Github

Summer 2017: Behaviour Modification was an app built for Psychology 282 students at the University of Alberta. With Master Student Raj Kapoor writing the content and questions, I was able to build the app from the ground up in the last two weeks of Sumemr 2017.
The app was developed using Swift in an XCode environment

iOS App Store

Summer 2015
